обалдеть: to be stunned, to be amazed (colloquial)
обуславливается: is stipulated by, is determined by (3rd pers. sing.)
одним миром мазаны: cut from the same cloth (lit. 'greased with the same world')
одного поля ягода: of the same ilk (lit. 'berry from the same field')
однолюб: one-woman/one-man man (person who loves only once)
оказавшийся: found oneself, turned out to be (participle)
опростоволоситься: to make a fool of oneself (colloquial)
осознавать: to realize, to be aware of (imperfective)
остаться с носом: to be left with nothing (lit. 'to be left with a nose')
откуда ни возьмись: out of nowhere, out of the blue
отметить: to note, to mark, to celebrate
отмечается: is noted, is observed (3rd pers. sing. passive)
относится: refers to, belongs to (3rd pers. sing.)
относить: to refer, to attribute, to carry away (imperfective)
отнюдь: by no means, not at all
отойти: to step aside, to move away
отпадает: falls away, becomes unnecessary (3rd pers. sing.)
отсутствует: is absent, is lacking (3rd pers. sing.)
отсутствуют: are absent, are lacking (3rd pers. plural)
офигел: was stunned, was amazed (slang, masculine past tense)
офигеть: to be stunned, to be amazed (slang, perfective)
охренел: was astonished/crazy (slang, masculine past tense, vulgar)
очень приятно: very pleasant, nice to meet you
очнуться: to regain consciousness, to come to (perfective)
очуметь: to go crazy, to be stunned (colloquial)
ощущается: is felt, is sensed (3rd pers. sing.)
овчинка выделки не стоит: the game is not worth the candle (lit. 'sheepskin is not worth the dressing')
ожить: to come to life, to revive (perfective)
озорничать: to play pranks, to be mischievous (imperfective)
олух царя небесного: complete idiot, total fool (lit. 'blockhead of the heavenly king')
оправиться: to recover, to regain one's composure (perfective)
основа основ: the foundation of foundations, the very basis
осуществлявшийся: being implemented, carried out (past passive participle)
от всего сердца: from the bottom of my heart
от горшка два вершка: knee-high to a grasshopper (lit. 'two vershoks from the pot')
отгородиться: to fence oneself off, to isolate oneself (perfective)
отмечаем: we note, we celebrate (1st pers. plural)
очкарик: four-eyes, person wearing glasses (colloquial, sometimes derogatory)
очухаться: to come to one's senses, to recover (colloquial, perfective)
